query: MATCH (jp:ncs__JobProfile)-[:ncs__hasSocCode]->(soc:ncs__SOCCode), (jp)-[:ncs__relatedOccupation]-(oc:esco__Occupation) OPTIONAL MATCH (dtd:ncs__DayToDayTask)<-[:ncs__hasDayToDayTask]-(jp) OPTIONAL MATCH (jp)-[:ncs__hasWorkingUniform]-(wu:ncs__WorkingUniform) OPTIONAL MATCH (jp)-[:ncs__hasWorkingEnvironment]-(we:ncs__WorkingEnvironment) OPTIONAL MATCH (jp)-[:ncs__hasWorkingLocation]-(wl:ncs__WorkingLocation) WITH jp, {Values:[jp.ncs__ModifiedDate, wu.ncs__ModifiedDate, soc.ncs__ModifiedDate, dtd.ncs__ModifiedDate, we.ncs__ModifiedDate, wl.ncs__ModifiedDate]} as ModifiedDates UNWIND ModifiedDates.Values as ModifiedDatesAsRows WITH { Url:$apiHost + '/getjobprofilessummary/Execute/' + jp.ncs__JobProfileWebsiteUrl, Title:jp.skos__prefLabel, LastUpdated:MAX(ModifiedDatesAsRows) } as profileUpdates RETURN collect(profileUpdates)
